org.hibernate.reactive.session

Interface ReactiveNativeQuery<R>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReactiveQuery<R>

    public interface ReactiveNativeQuery<R>
extends ReactiveQuery<R>
    An internal contract between the reactive session implementation and the Stage.Query and Mutiny.Query APIs.
    See Also:
    ReactiveSession
